feed.title: Scrypted Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Scrypted: v0.105.0
entry.content:
Commits

  • 9df3997: postrelease (Koushik Dutta)
  • b593209: Fix bticino intercom, clean up some dependencies (#1463) (slyoldfox) #1463
  • don't store audio codec before intercom start (#1462) #1462 (Greg Thornton)
  • fix late 2way setup (#1461) #1461 (Greg Thornton)
  • publish (Koushik Dutta)
  • Update config.yaml (Koushik Dutta)
  • b4e6821: tensorflow-lite: use dict vs queue for perf (Koushik Dutta)
  • multiple gpu support (Koushik Dutta)
  • 8b84bac: snapshot/homekit: fix stale snapshots (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix weird npm cache bug (Koushik Dutta)
  • ca96959: openvino/onnx: move prep into separate threads (Koushik Dutta)
  • -y on choco install (Koushik Dutta)
  • update pypi (Koushik Dutta)
  • 01dd480: Merge branch 'main' of github.com:koush/scrypted (Koushik Dutta)
  • mount changes may need systemctl daemon-reload (Koushik Dutta)
  • yolo-nas (Koushik Dutta)
  • aadfacf: Merge branch 'main' of github.com:koush/scrypted (Koushik Dutta)
  • 4ac5ded: openvino/onnx: publish yolo nas (Koushik Dutta)
  • rollback to stable openvino (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix setup script (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix yolo nas labels (Koushik Dutta)
  • header casing preservation (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix 2 way audio on some models (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix 2 way audio on some models (Koushik Dutta)
  • 820ef70: predict plugins: refactor recog, add onnx, fix spurious model leaks (Koushik Dutta)
  • new option to reset smart motion sensor only when motion stops (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix bug (Koushik Dutta)
  • 0321846: storage-settings/videoanalysis: fix default value of 0 (Koushik Dutta)
  • cleanup (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix python runtime worker setup (Koushik Dutta)
  • add methods to manage plugin engine.io connections (Koushik Dutta)
  • 9083e16: postbeta (Koushik Dutta)
  • 452fe20: docker/lxc: update intel graphics install script (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix missing intel dep (Koushik Dutta)
  • fceed68: postbeta (Koushik Dutta)
  • fd1aa10: postbeta (Koushik Dutta)
  • update intel opencl in lxc (Koushik Dutta)
  • 1445933: postbeta (Koushik Dutta)

entry.title: New release for Scrypted: v0.106.0
entry.content:
Commits

  • f0d6598: postrelease (Koushik Dutta)
  • make fetching network interfaces optional (#1474) #1474 (Brett Jia)
  • fix legacy boundary https://github.com/koush/scrypted/issues/1475 (Koushik Dutta)
  • add windows cuda support (Koushik Dutta)
  • Fix Windows server install with installDir containing space (#1471) #1471 (Long Zheng)
  • publish (Koushik Dutta)
  • initial pass and removing legacy parsers (Koushik Dutta)
  • parser perf refactor (Koushik Dutta)
  • more parser refactor (Koushik Dutta)
  • report device in use (Koushik Dutta)
  • 75bb15d: Revert "server: make fetching network interfaces optional (#1474)" (#1478) (Brett Jia) #1478
  • further removal of legacy code (Koushik Dutta)
  • add SCRYPTED_COMPATIBILITY_FILE (#1479) #1479 (Brett Jia)
  • publish (Koushik Dutta)
  • update (Koushik Dutta)
  • types (Koushik Dutta)
  • beta (Koushik Dutta)
  • change default advertiser back to ciao due to issues. use identifying material (Koushik Dutta)
  • print python interpreter path (#1484) #1484 (Brett Jia)
  • 108d57d: Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/main' into rebroadcast (Koushik Dutta)
  • allow specifying exact server version to install (#1485) #1485 (Brett Jia)
  • Homekit camera close recording tweaks (#1486) #1486 (Long Zheng)
  • Add security_opt to allow container to talk to host avahi daemon (#1487) #1487 (Jonathan Yip)
  • replace local install test with setup-scrypted action (#1488) #1488 (Brett Jia)
  • label score (Koushik Dutta)
  • fix partition detection (Koushik Dutta)
  • yolov10 (Koushik Dutta)
  • label scores (Koushik Dutta)
  • 1e2fd46: Revert "rebroadcast: more parser refactor" (Koushik Dutta)
  • 7071808: Revert "rebroadcast: parser perf refactor" (Koushik Dutta)
  • fixup reverts (Koushik Dutta)
  • beta (Koushik Dutta)
  • f65485a: Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/main' into rebroadcast (Koushik Dutta)
  • yolov10 (Koushik Dutta)
  • checks to ensure plugin restart doesnt ignore zombie states (Koushik Dutta)
  • add text recognition (#1490) #1490 (Brett Jia)
  • fix text recognition thread names (#1491) #1491 (Brett Jia)
  • republish with smaller plate/face models. fix openvino thread bugs (Koushik Dutta)
  • cdd81da: Merge branch 'main' of github.com:koush/scrypted (Koushik Dutta)
  • use correct nativeId for text recognition (#1492) #1492 (Brett Jia)

entry.title: New release for Scrypted: v0.108.0
entry.content:
Commits

  • fcfedcc: postrelease (Koushik Dutta)
  • yolov10m (Koushik Dutta)
  • more logging (Koushik Dutta)
  • 2d3589b: unifi-protect: fix id remapping (Koushik Dutta)
  • 239d498: unifi-protect: fix id remapping (Koushik Dutta)
  • listenZeroSingleClient configurable timeout (Koushik Dutta)
  • log plugin load failure (Koushik Dutta)
  • guard entire plugin load block (Koushik Dutta)
